name: PopOut
description:
Pop Out is a Colorfull Frenetic Arcade Game.

The player must clean the area with his entities : many invaders come regulary from 4 spot. Don't let them fill the arena until the end of the Game !

Place the same color to destroy an enemy, but the others colors will chase your entities.

You must place your entities carefully to let them chase the their target.

Made By :

LOURTIES Thomas - HUBERT Florian - NGUYEN Huynh-Trung-Tin
